snippet: How do you renovate ancient stone arrangements? At Stonehenge, that meant reconfiguring a highway and building a new visitor center.
abstract: Edward Rothstein Critic's Notebook; British government agency English Heritage is near completion of $44 million renovation of visitor center at Stonehenge; transformation eliminates highway, replaces visitor center and emphasizes tourist aspect while celebrating ancient stone circle.
lead_paragraph: How do you renovate ancient stone arrangements? At Stonehenge, that meant reconfiguring a highway and building a new visitor center.

headline.seo: Stonehenge at Dawn, Inside the Circle
headline.main: Among the Ancient Stones, Magic as Potent as Ever
headline.print_headline: Among the Ancient Stones, Magic as Potent as Ever
